articles.title: 2021 Audi E-Tron GT launched, due in Australia in the second half of this year - CarAdvice
articles.description: The 2021 Audi E-Tron GT – a twin under the skin to the Porsche Taycan electric car – has finally been unveiled, and the first examples are due in Australian showrooms between July and September (Q3...
articles.content:
The Porsche Taycan-based electric Audi E-Tron GT has been unveiled, with Quattro and RS variants due in local showrooms by the end of this year.
